title: @RIOT I recently had a security issue, not all of my tickets are instantly deleting?!
body: I posted a ticket to try to get a security issue resolved, and they all keep self deleting and everything is replaced with REDACTED. Now my account is temporarily banned (We did so for security reasons) and I have no way to unban it because my tickets are broken. Someone help! T^T

replies.body:
Try submitting a recovery request using [**this specific form**](http://riot.com/2iGnX0K). One of our recovery specialists will reach back out when possible and just as a heads-up, keep an eye on your email inbox for our reply!

If this doesn't work for you, just let me know!
